vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an alcoholic beverage establishment limited to a bar, lounge or tavern on property zoned a CR Community Retail District, on the northeast line of North Fitzhugh Avenue, northwest of Bryan Street
Recommendation of Staff:   Approval for a two-year period, subject to site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to site plan and conditions
Z245-173(LG)
